version_description:
- New updated light design.
- Thank to all the users of Everpix that you are with us! We are constantly trying to make the app better! We are very glad to hear your reviews and offers! Share with friends and enjoy wallpapers from Everpix!

- New updated light design.
- Thank to all the users of Everpix that you are with us! We are constantly trying to make the app better! We are very glad to hear your reviews and offers! Share with friends and enjoy wallpapers from Everpix!

Now, Everpix is available for Apple Watch! Try it right now!

- Offline mode, browse preloaded pictures, even if you aren’t online!
- Less popups and hints, don’t distract from the browsing!
- We’ve translated the app to most of the languages!
- New pictures are added every day! Create a new look of your device, as much often, as you want!

Thank to all the users of Everpix that you are with us! We are constantly trying to make the app better! We are very glad to hear your reviews and offers! Share with friends and enjoy wallpapers from Everpix!

Everpix team.

- increased the speed of loading at startup;
- enhanced the speed of loading wallpapers in the scrolling mode;
- increased the stability of the application:
- NEW cool wallpapers are adding every day! See what awesome backgrounds have been added today!
Thank to all the users of Everpix, for being with us! We are constantly trying to make the app better! We are very glad to hear your opinion and offers! Waiting for your reviews!
Share with family and friends and enjoy wallpapers from Everpix!

We’ve fully recreated Everpix to make it a lot better for you! We’ve worked very hard, so we’re impatiently waiting for your feedback!
- New fresh user interface;
- Grid mode;
- Increased speed of loading;
- Stability improvements;
- Fixed all major bugs;
- New category - Fashion;
- A lot of improvements, you’ve asked;
- Wallpapers you’ve asked will be adding within some time.
Thank you for staying with us! We’re always working very hard to make Everpix the best! Waiting for your reviews and feedback!

Dear users! We’re very glad to announce the new version of Everpix 3.2, we’ve worked on very hard and productively! Probably it took longer, but we really hope we tried not in vain.

In this version you’ll see:
- Popular category are updated every week. Enter Everpix more often to be trendy.
- Calendars every month! They’ll add at the end of each month. Don’t forget to change!
- Favorites are saved to iCloud. Browse your favorite wallpapers at all of your devices (you can turn it off in settings).
- Fixed problems for Arabic language.
- We’ve spent a lot of time to improve the stability of the app, and all wallpapers should display correct and stable now.
- Fixed small bugs.

We thank all of you for using Everpix. We re working for you! We would like to give special thanks to users, who tell us about problems in the app and gives us ideas to improve Everpix!

Don’t forget to rate us on the App Store, we really need it!
We’re gladly waiting for your reviews and offers!

Dear users! We’re very glad to announce the new version of Everpix 3.2, we’ve worked on very hard and productively! Probably it took longer, but we really hope we tried not in vain.

In this version you’ll see:
- Popular category are updated every week. Enter Everpix more often to be trendy.
- Calendars every month! They’ll add at the end of each month. Don’t forget to change!
- Favorites are saved to iCloud. Browse your favorite wallpapers at all of your devices (you can turn it off in settings).
- Fixed problems for Arabic language.
- We’ve spent a lot of time to improve the stability of the app, and all wallpapers should display correct and stable now.
- Fixed small bugs.

We thank all of you for using Everpix. We re working for you! We would like to give special thanks to users, who tell us about problems in the app and gives us ideas to improve Everpix!

Don’t forget to rate us on the App Store, we really need it!
We’re gladly waiting for your reviews and offers!

Dear Friends!

We’re listening to you reviews very careful!

In this version, we’ve fixed the problem, when some of you, who have iPad Pro, saw low quality wallpapers;

We’ll keep working on fixing bugs and improving Everpix!

Thank you for using Everpix, and we hope you’ll enjoy new wallpapers, we’ve chosen for you!

Your opinion is very important! We’re waiting for your reviews and suggestions impatiently!

Please rate us on the App Store! It’s very important to us! Thank you!
